testcase.name: verify title of new SCD login page
testcase.system-out: Given launch new SCD url....................................................passed When check title of login page..............................................passed Then verify actual title with expected title of New SCD login page..........passed

testcase.name: verify new SCD login functionalty with Negative Login Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user click on New SCD username text field.............................passed When user enters invalid username and password..............................passed And click on sign in button to login into New SCD...........................passed And user refresh the login page.............................................passed Then user enters valid username and password................................passed And user click on sign in button to login into New SCD......................passed

testcase.name: From Admin login Edit a user details
testcase.system-out: Given login New SCD with Admin User.........................................passed And click on NewSCD user management.........................................passed When Search for a user and click on three dots against a user...............passed And select option edit user.................................................passed And edit user details.......................................................passed And save the edited user details............................................passed Then check edited details are saved successfully............................passed
